channel.title: Pets!
channel.description:
[u]Rules[/u] 1) No Spamming or flamming someone because of what kind/what there pet it 2) please try not to be dumb :)
Ok so basiclly here's what you do!
just tell us...
1) what kind of pet you have 2) what breed it is 3) And if you want post a picture! (Recommended)
this is just for fun not competition
heres mine
Name: Shelby Type of pet: Dog Breed: Toy Australian Shepard! (this was takin at 3 Months when we first got her :) so she's grown)\
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/1673/shelby1mp5.jpg[/img][/URL]
Name: Beamer Type of pet: Dog breed: Pure bread Australian Shepard Soz messed up picture
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img117.imageshack.us/img117/1470/1203573812myx5.jpg[/img][/URL]
Name: HollyWood Type of pet: Dog beed: Sybirian Husky (Sadly Died of parvo)
[URL=http://img117.imageshack.us/my.php?image=10405762hb6.jpg][IMG]http://img117.imageshack.us/img117/6586/10405762hb6.th.jpg[/img][/URL] Just a random picture i took.. of beamer and shelby playing :)
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/7489/shelbsbeamsim0.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Pets!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“yakman, post:13, topic:137966”]Cats FTW

dogs are dirty, they stink, they droll, they roll around in dirt
cats are clean.

End of story. (for me anyway)

i have a 6 year old tabby called Mosho, its the best in the world[/quote]

I know it’s an opinion thing, but imo cats are sneaky and aren’t loyal like a dog. Not to mention that if you let them go outside, then half the time they come back and drop dead animals onto your bed -.- So then I give it a boot in the arse. A cat will never love it’s owner like a dog does. Dogs will defend their owner till death(I have some examples). My dog is clean, doesn’t druel, and smells fine. If he rolls in the dirt then we clean him off. Anyways of course we both have our own prejudices.

I’m going to be buying a White-faced capuchin [monkey] someday soon. I would love a chimp, but it’s just not practical.

Read full topic
